  • Ubuntu 14.04.4 LTS
  • TensorFlow 0.8.0
  • Keras 1.0.4
  • Python 2.7
  • CUDA 7.5

I'm attempting to upgrade to Ubuntu 16 and the latest TensorFlow version.
